Module com.lmax.solana4j
Package com.lmax.solana4j.api

Interface MessageBuilderV0

  • public interface MessageBuilderV0
    Interface for building V0 messages for the Solana blockchain.

    This interface provides methods for setting instructions, specifying the payer, setting the recent blockhash, adding account lookups, and sealing the message.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      MessageBuilderV0 instructions​(java.util.function.Consumer<TransactionBuilder> builder)
      Sets the instructions for the V0 message.

      Sets the account lookups for the V0 message.
      MessageBuilderV0 payer​(PublicKey account)
      Sets the payer for the V0 message.
      MessageBuilderV0 prebuiltInstructions​(java.util.List<TransactionInstruction> instructions)
      Sets the prebuilt instructions for the legacy message.
      MessageBuilderV0 recent​(Blockhash blockHash)
      Sets the recent blockhash for the V0 message.
      SealedMessageBuilder seal()
      Seals the V0 message and returns a sealed message builder.

        Returns:

      • seal

        SealedMessageBuilder seal()
                   throws java.nio.BufferOverflowException
        Seals the V0 message and returns a sealed message builder.

        This method finalizes the construction of a V0 message, ensuring that all required data is properly written into the buffer. It then returns a SealedMessageBuilder instance representing the sealed message.

        Returns:
        a SealedMessageBuilder instance representing the sealed message
        Throws:
        java.nio.BufferOverflowException - if there is insufficient space in the buffer to write the complete message data. This can occur if the buffer size is smaller than required to hold all the data necessary for the message.
